name: HarryPotterFacts
0:
”Alexa open harry potter facts and tell me a fact”
”Alexa ask harry potter facts to tell me a harry potter fact”
”Alexa open harry potter facts and give me a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: harry potter facts
des: This is a trivia-based skill which provides a user with interesting and sometimes mind-blowing facts about harry potter. It gives facts about actors, scenes and various stories in Harry Potter Series.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
